description.text: The witch may bless a bush, plant, or tree that is planted in the ground, so that it creates a plentiful harvest.

sections.Effect: Each day at dawn, this blessed bush grows a number of goodberries equal to twice her witch level. Berries on the tree remain until they are picked, but the tree can never manifest a number of berries greater than twice her level at one time. The witch may only have one witch's bounty active at a time, but can shift her blessing to a new plant with a ritual requiring 1 hour.
